Headline: Temporary Northbound #171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park Reroute near 60th/Dorchester
ShortDescription: Northbound 171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park buses are temporarily rerouted near 60th/Dorchester.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Woodlawn, 55th, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 60th/Dorchester.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/North
ShortDescription: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand: due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand and the resume their normal route at  Narragansett, due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Racine
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing near Racine due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near Racine due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#7 Harrison

#8 Halsted

#60 Blue Island/26th

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
